traitDesc: Gregarious and quick to make friends, gain Charisma % chance to learn a Rumor when Spicing
+25% Chance to Survive Death Saves
At home in the Spice Hall, gain +20% Morale bonus when Spicing
Pay Rate increases by $2 every level
Pay Rate increases by $1 every level, double Morale penalty if not paid when other Crew are paid
20% chance to gain permanent +1 Command Skill Bonus when leveling (max 12)
20% chance to gain permanent +1 Negotiate Skill Bonus when leveling (max 12)
Captivating personality keeps people in your orbit, 10% + Charisma chance that crew will not abandon when at critically low Morale, only if Officer or Captain
Pay Rate increase when leveling is 80% less likely
Known for spinning engaging tales and cracking hilarious jokes, gains 30% + Charisma chance to increase Morale gains in Spice Hall by +2
Tough to put down, +5% Death Save to survive lethal hit in any situation
Dominant presence reduces cost of paying off mutineers by 10%
Once below 50 Morale, obstinately digs in on a grudge and all Morale gains are reduced by 50%
Insatiable drive to travel can only be sated by new experiences, gain 5 to 10 Morale when orbiting a new world
Excited by far-flung travel, gains 3-6 Morale when making a Hyperwarp jump
Empathetic and approachable, a gain in Morale causes an equal gain for another crew member
Exhilarated by wandering new and dangerous lands, gains a Resilience % chance to recover 3 to 5 Morale whenever Exploring
What might terrify others invokes an intense fascination, gain +6 Morale when encountering xeno ship
Illness from the savage pull of gravity, loss of 3 to 6 HP when landing on a world
Afflicted by even the slightest radiation, loss of 3 to 10 HP and Morale when sailing through Radiation Storms
Security of gravity and spice hall are a reminder of the loneliness of space, loss of 1 to 4 Morale on landing on a world
Volatile temperament brings down energy, 50% to double all negative Morale changes
Wrenching experience of Hyperwarp travel causes sickness, loss of 3 to 10 HP when jumping Hyperwarp
Charisma % chance to learn about a new Contact when Spicing in the Hall
Sickening dread paralyzes when encountering something alien, loss of 6 Morale when encountering xeno ship
Dependable and enduring, all Morale loss is reduced by 50%
Never suffers a Morale Break in Crew Combat, regardless of how low Morale is
Stubborn and stuck in old ways, 25% chance of not gaining XP
Gain Morale whenever ending ship combat in Draw or Ransom, lose Morale when destroying enemy ship
Always alert and wary of danger, reduces crew and ship damage by 10% whenever Exploring
Astute and clever, +25% chance of gaining double XP
Naturally voracious seeker, gain +10% rewards whenever Exploring
Perplexing and good at hiding the truth of things, this one has 50% resistance to hidden Traits being discovered
Artful in devious craft, gain +10% Intel Record rewards whenever Spying (max 30%)
Proud to do the right thing, gains a Wisdom % chance to recover 3 to 5 Morale whenever Patrolling
Surly and morose, Morale never rises above 80
20% chance to gain permanent +1 Stealth Skill Bonus when leveling (max 12)
20% chance to gain permanent +1 Repair Skill Bonus when leveling (max 12)
When boarding, +10% Dmg to enemy ship components
20% chance to gain permanent +1 Pilot Skill Bonus when leveling (max 12)
Adept at picking over the wreck for valuable scrap, gain +10% credits when Salvaging enemy ship or orbital (max 30%)
Special obsession with tech and devices allows equip of 2nd Gear slot, only if Officer or Captain
Committed to the ship, the captain and the crew, has only a 20% chance to abandon the ship due to low Morale
Frightening and overawing with threats, gain +10% profits on forcing other ships to give Tribute (max 30%)
Reveling in death and destruction, gain Morale whenever destroying enemy ship but lose Morale whenever ending combat in Draw or Ransom
Penchant for taking out frustration on others, a loss in Morale causes an equal loss from another crew member
20% chance to gain permanent +1 Intimidate Skill Bonus when leveling (max 12)
Scary in the worst way, confiscates 10% more Credits whenever successfully Blockading (max 30%)
Increases chance that Trait mutation will result in other addiction-related Traits
Only gains 50% Morale while at the Spice Hall
Refuses anything but spice at the Spice Hall, requires more time and money
Pay Rate increases by $3 every level, gains extra Morale bonus whenever paid
Constantly fixating on something good or bad, double all negative or positive Morale changes
Death cannot break pure will, gains ability to survive even after failing Death Save; once Revenant has prevented a death it is removed
Going out in a blaze of glory, -25% Death Save to survive lethal hit in any situation
Vivid and disturbing memories of past trauma cause paralysis, always 25% Stunned in Crew Combat
Lacking any illusions, 50% chance of resisting any positive or negative Morale change
25% chance to lose 2-4 Morale when spicing in the brazen carnival of a 6 or higher Spice Hall. Loses 2-4 Morale on successfully accessing a Black Market
Always joins the Captain's side of a Mutiny
Unshakable in resolve, Morale will never drop below 50
Commanding and convinced of own authority, gains a Charisma % chance to increase Reputation bonuses by 25% whenever on Patrol
At times condescending to the point of being insulting, gains a 50% chance to cause Morale loss in other crew members when spending time in the Spice Hall
Expansive and lightning fast mind leaps to conclusions and solutions, +50% chance of gaining double XP
Resistant to new ideas
Pay Rate increases by $2 every level, suffers Morale penalty if paid as a Crew instead of Officer

Seeing past worldly turmoil leads to inner zen, reduces Morale loss by 25%
Always rises against the Captain in a Mutiny
20% chance to gain permanent +1 Evasion Skill Bonus when leveling (max 8)
Upstanding and stern in peaceful ransom, gain +10% profits on Ransoming enemy ship
Dogged in the pursuit, completing any mission step that requires an Edict grants +10% payment, extra Rep and a personal XP bonus
A natural predator, +2 Resilience, +10% All Accuracy, +2 Initiative
Obsessive in the search, double the chance of drawing Xeno Artifact cards while Exploring and Exploring Missions start with +10% chance to draw Mission card
Highly skilled at riding the galactic winds, +2 Wisdom, +1 Resilience and reduces travel time and fuel consumption by 10%
Well-versed in every aspect of the trade, +2 Charisma, +1 Wisdom and gains +10% profit when trading at an Exchange
Known for legitimate dealings, reduces the hostility of law-abiding ships (Military Officers, Merchants, Bounty Hunters, Zealots) encountered in travel by 1
A faction soldier, any Orbital Ops card that adds Rep gains +2-4 bonus and Blockade or Patrol Missions start with +10% chance to draw Mission card
Hardened by military training, +1 Quickness, +2 Fortitude, +10% Armor, +10% All Accuracy
Demanding ferocity brooks no argument, +2 Resilience, +1 Fortitude and doubles all Credits extorted from enemy captains in Blockade or Ship Encounter
Eager to hunt profit, gains +10 Boarding, +10% Accuracy, +5 Range Change in Ship Combat
Leveraging the risk required to avoid trade law, +1 Quickness, +2 Charisma and gains +10% profit when trading at a Black Market
Always dodging the law, gains +5 Escape, +10% Defense, +5% Shield in Ship Combat
Intergalactic character of mystery, +2 Wisdom, +1 Charisma and gains +15% profit when selling Conflict Intel to one of the involved factions
Either about to disappear or backstab, gains +5 Escape, +5% Shield, +10% Critical in Ship Combat
Antagonistic faction supporter, gains extra +3-4 Conflict Score and a personal XP bonus whenever impacting a Conflict
Diehard and inflexible, +2 Resilience, +2 Initiative, +10% All Damage, Morale never breaks in Crew Combat
Infected crew are contagious and may spread the Crimson Pox to faction landing zones

Crimson pox survivor
Having survived worse, all Morale loss is reduced by 50%
Thrilled by the high-stakes risks, gains a Resilience % chance to recover 5 to 8 Morale whenever Salvaging at an Orbital
Good at spotting hiding spots, grants +10% cargo rewards whenever Salvaging an orbital (max 30%)

All scrap has a use, fixes 2 ship components up to Repair Skill whenever salvaging a destroyed ship or drawing a Salvage card that grants Credits and Salvage Missions start with +10% chance to draw Mission card
Rough but durable and approachable, +2 Fortitude, +2 Wisdom and gains 10% chance to learn a Salvage Rumor when Spicing
Reputable and trustworthy, adds +1-2 bonus Personal and faction Rep whenever completing a Mission step and reduces negative Rep by 1
Utterly practiced at the art of persuasion, +3 Charisma, +2 Wisdom and reduces cost of Contact Introduction by 15% while granting a +20 Personal Rep bonus
Seeks high-value targets, when crew combat includes an enemy officer or captain then immediately gains a Buff for +15% Critical, +10% Dodge, +10% Parry and Stealth Mode for 3 Turns
Coiled spring ready to strike, +1 Strength, +1 Fortitude, +3 Initiative
Defeat is unimaginable, gains +10% Accuracy, +5% Defense, +10% Protection against Crew and Morale Dmg/Turn in Ship Combat
Stirring words and powerful presence, gains +2 Charisma, +2 Wisdom, +1 Initiative, +20% Debuff Resist
Constantly worried about unknown medical maladies, healing costs twice as much as usual
Constantly on edge, all Morale gains are reduced by 50%
Bearing a charter stained in the blood of xeno, gains extra Rep bonus with all factions in a quadrant for destroying a Xeno ship and a personal XP bonus
Resolute and unwavering in the hunt, +2 Resilience, +1 Fortitude, +2 Initiative, +15% Armor and Morale will never drop below 50
A thorough and focused approach helps bring missions in successfully, gains +5% on all Mission payments (3 max)
20% chance to gain permanent +1 Gunnery Skill Bonus when leveling (max 12)
A natural knack for digging, gain +10% on Raw resource, Rare and Artifact rewards whenever Exploring (max 30%)
A wanderer and a seeker, may abandon the ship due to low Morale even when promoted to Officer

Independent thinker, +10% chance of gaining double XP
Pliable in thought and movement

Gain 5-10 Morale when launching a craft flight plan
Acute observer and quick study, +2 Wisdom, +2 Resilience and gains +15% profit when selling Scientific Intel
Thorough and exhaustive in the search for new knowledge, double the chance of drawing Scientific Intel while Exploring or during Orbital Salvage
Genetically encoded memories of a thousand years of Zendu ancestory
Often set to a single, resolute purpose, +2 Fortitude, +2 Resilience, +2 Initiative, +20% Debuff Resist, Morale never breaks in Crew Combat
Charging to battle even from the bridge of their ship, gains +20 Boarding, +1 Initiative and +5 Range Change in Ship Combat
